general.shortcuts top signaldisplay: Shortcuts of the signaldisplay on the top
general.shortcuts down signaldisplay: Shortcuts of the signaldisplay on the bottom

delete.text:
Do you really want to delete the previous Transcription and create a new one?

Your progress on the previous transcription will be deleted. This action can not be reverted.

stop.text:
Do you really want to stop the transcription?

Your proceedings have been saved in your Browser. If you want to continue later you do not have to delete the browser cache. Please use the same browser as in this moment.

login.text: Please check your username and your password.

login.online mode disabled: Online mode is currently inactive. Please use OCTRA locally.
login.old file found:
There is data from a previous transcription. If you like to continue your work, just drag & drop the following file to the gray box:

{{file_label}}

dropzone.drag&drop here: Drag & Drop audio file (*.wav) here or click here.

browser.invalid: Your browser is not compatible. Please use one of the these browsers:

reload-file.text: This application was closed or refreshed before. Please select the same audio file again. After that you can continue your work.
reload-file.file not supported: Type of file is '{{type}}' and not supported.
reload-file.another file selected:
Another file selected. Please select the same file as before or start a new transcription.

Wanted: '{{file}}'
